pageContent.description: Greetings, web wanderers! Let's takes you on a stroll through the world of tech without the hype. No fancy blog jargon, just a straightforward exploration of the gadgets, gizmos, and digital quirks that shape our lives. This blog is dedicated to motivate my self into the ways of technology, but it's also for you curious fellow who have the same goal but needs a bit of help in the process.

blogs.title: How to read and execute file using Node.js
blogs.description: A brief tutorial on how to read and execute file using Node.js

blogs.title: Use Markdown in React to create dynamic content
blogs.description: React and Markdown are a powerful combination. Learn how to use Markdown in React to create dynamic content.

blogs.title: Vue.js Directives
blogs.description: One of the powerful features in Vue.js is directives, which provide a declarative way to extend HTML with custom behavior. .

blogs.title: Npm Introduction and Tutorial
blogs.description: Npm is the package manager for JavaScript. Find, share, and reuse packages of code from hundreds of thousands of developers â€” and assemble them in powerful new ways.

blogs.title: Read and write files using node js
blogs.description: Get started with node js. The runtime environment for javascript. Learn how to read and write text file using the fs module.

blogs.title: Using the OS module of Node js
blogs.description: Learn how to use the os module for your next web app.
